title: Getting the intermolecular forces correct: introducing the ASTA strategy for a water model
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25712-25727
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02685C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiří Mareš, Pau Mayorga Delgado
For simple water models, parameters giving the best intermolecular forces cannot provide accurate bulk properties. For AMOEBA model, such parameters can be found.
